articles.author: John Liu, Lisa Eadicicco
articles.title: Trump’s tariffs could cost Apple $900 million this quarter, CEO Tim Cook says - CNN
articles.description: Tariffs could add $900 million to Apple’s costs this quarter, Apple CEO Tim Cook said on Thursday, as he revealed the tech giant was shifting production of iPhones sold in the United States from China to India.
articles.content: Tariffs could add $900 million to Apples costs this quarter, Apple CEO Tim Cook said on Thursday, as he revealed the tech giant was shifting production of iPhones sold in the United States from China… [+3174 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: India will include caste details in its next census - NPR
articles.description: The count is likely lead to demands to raise the country's quotas that reserve government jobs, college admissions and elected offices for lower and intermediate castes.
articles.content:
NEW DELHI India will include caste details in its next census, in a move likely to have sweeping socio-economic and political ramifications for the world's most populous country.
